pages.text: 89|24|vah kaamana karega ke kaash! apane sada ki jeevan ke lie karm kiye hote.
89|25|us din (allaah) ke dand ke samaan koee dand nahin hoga.
89|26|aur na usake jaisee jakad koee jakadega.
89|27|he shaant aatma
89|28|apane paalanahaar kee or chal, too usase prasann, aur vah tujh se prasann.
89|29|too mere bhakton mein pravesh kar ja.
89|30|aur mere svarg mein pravesh kar ja.
90|1|main is nagar makka kee shapath leta hoon
90|2|tatha tum is nagar mein pravesh karane vaale ho.
90|3|tatha saugandh hai pita evan usakee santaan kee
90|4|hamane insaan ko kasht mein ghira hua paida kiya hai.
90|5|kya vah samajhata hai ki usapar kisee ka vash nahin chalega
90|6|vah kahata hai ki mainne bahut dhan kharch kar diya.
90|7|kya vah samajhata hai ki use kisee ne dekha nahin
90|8|kya hamane use do aankhen nahin deen
90|9|aur ek zabaan tatha do hont nahin diye
90|10|aur use donon maarg dikha diye.
90|11|to vah ghaatee mein ghusa hee nahin.
90|12|aur tum kya jaano ki ghaatee kya hai
90|13|kisee daas ko mukt karana.
90|14|athava bhook ke din (akaal) mein khaana khilaana.
90|15|kisee anaath sambandhee ko.
90|16|athava mittee mein pade nirdhan ko.
90|17|phir vah un logon mein hota hai jo eemaan laaye aur jinhonne dhairy (sahanasheelata) evan upakaar ke upadesh diye.
90|18|yahee log saubhaagyashaalee (daayen haath vaale) hain.
90|19|aur jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton ko nahin maana, yahee log durbhaagy (baayen haath vaale) hain.
90|20|aise log, har or se aag mein ghire honge.
